scripts.build: mkdir -p build/ && rm build/lambda.zip && zip --quiet -r build/lambda.zip node_modules/uuid/* && cd src && zip --quiet ../build/lambda.zip *
scripts.integration-test: cd test/integration && export COMPOSE_PROJECT_NAME=${RANDOM}; docker-compose up --abort-on-container-exit --exit-code-from tests; EXIT_CODE=$?; docker-compose down; exit $EXIT_CODE
